subject: Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Colgate advanced to the quarterfinals of the Temple Cup for student eights at the Henley Royal Regatta when it rallied to beat England’s Eton College by three-and-a-quarter lengths. Georgetown also advanced to the last eight in the same event after dominating Nihon University of Japan to win by three lengths. The Hoyas will race California, which easily beat England’s Reading University. In the Ladies’ Plate for elite eights, Brown University easily beat a composite English crew. Syracuse won in the same event, as did a composite crew from the New York Athletic Club and England’s Molesey Boat Club.
